channel.title: Hell or High Water on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: David Mackenzie on the “Yin-and-Yang” Relationship Between ‘Relay’ and ‘Hell or High Water’
item.description: The filmmaker was an early Taylor Sheridan adopter with the 2016 neo-western: “It was the best script I’ve ever read.”
